page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: {MILLBROOK}is located in the Maker and Rame Peninsula area of Caradon District.4 miles West of Plymouth.It stands at the head of Millbrook Creek, West of the River Tamar where it enters Plymouth Sound.The village lies in a valley about 1 mile from the sea at Whitsand Bay.The population of Millbrook is about 2100 inhabitants.It has a variety of 16 shops,3 inns,a social club,a church,a chapel,4 garages,1 school,a playgroup and is surounded by fields of mainly grass,cereals and root crops together with an area of woodlands. {ST.JOHN}is located 2 miles South West of Torpoint.It lies at the head of St.John's Lake.
